job_description: You will be a member of the above group, which is responsible for:Telecom Transport communication systems for Power System applications, including Point to Point Microwave Radio, WiMAX, 2-Way Mobile Radio and SONET Systems, and supporting subsystems including DC Power, physical security & local alarming. Your job duties may include:- Developing design standards, deployment designs and configuration settings, updating reports for telecommunications systems and projects.- Assisting other team members with project of greater complexity- Perform other duties as required. This job will provide you with the following professional development:- General knowledge of Telecom for Power Systems.
